origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompetitorAnalysisAPI.compare_market_share', 'description': 'This function compares the market share of a specified company against its competitors in a given product category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'competitors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of competitor company names.'}, {'name': 'product_category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of products, e.g., semiconductor, consumer_electronics.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share_comparison', 'description': 'The comparison of market share between the specified company and its competitors.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，分析这些数据在先进制造技术（如半导体和智能制造）上的表现。接下来，获取东芝公司的竞争对手市场份额数据。
